Shockwave/Firestarter/Unitron/Sixshot/Ares/Double Punch/Injector/Manterror:




Firestarter sat at the bridge of the Ramora in the throne and watched with 
interest as the scanners went off, detecting a great deal of weapons fire.  
He pressed a few buttons on the left armrest, a visual of the area being 
displayed.

The ancient Decepticon activated a comm. link with the Neo Decepticon 
Emperor, Shockwave.

"Shockwave, it's Firestarter.  I'm detecting a battle involving a dozen 
robots engaging in the Colorado area, more precisely the Rocky Mountain 
region."

"Very good, Firestarter.  Send the new recruit, Rainchark, to come aid 
Unitron and I as we engage these enemies.  The other Decepticons will 
continue with their salvage operation.  Shockwave out."

The comm. link ended and Firestarter sighed.  "Of course, leave me out of the 
battle."  He pressed a few more buttons and activated a comm. link with 
Rainchark.

"Rainchark, this is Firestarter on the bridge," he pressed another button and 
a compressed amount of data including longitudes and latitudes and 3D maps 
were sent to the new 'Con, "go to these locations where as far as we can tell 
two factions are fighting with each other.  Our Emperor Shockwave and other 
soldier Unitron will be there engaging the enemy, you are to asist them."

===

Sixshot transformed to his biped mode, hovering a dozen feet above the ground 
as his long range scans came to a finish.  "The area is clear!" he called 
down to his comrades, slowly lowering to the ground softly.

"This brings back memories," Ares muttered as he finished staring at the site 
of the once proud Newcomer base, "old Koga Shuko didn't know what hit him."

"Who cares about Koga Puko?  We've got a job to do." Injector said, pushing 
past the two others, Double Punch and Manterror following behind.

"Hell Beast had a single salvage operation earlier, but he didn't even get a 
third of what is here.  How are we going to do this, anyway?" Double Punch 
asked, launching his cyberbee, Beeline, into the air for extra surveillance.

"Ares, Manterror, and I will load up our subspace pockets with as much cargo 
as we can carry, and then Ares and I will load our space fighter modes with 
wreckage and Manterror will act as an escort when we return to the Ramora and 
then come back here."

"Sounds good enough." Ares replied, going at a brisk walk towards the 
wreckage.  "But if you ask me, Unitron should be doing this.  He's the jerk 
that blew the damn thing up."
